snippet: The state is the first to change its laws, mostly for the better, since the Connecticut shooting.
abstract: Editorial welcomes broad gun control bill approved by New York Legislature, which, if enforced, could make state one of toughest places in country to buy, sell or own dangerous weapons; warns bill contains troubling provisions involving mental health and public access to important records that prevent it from becoming national model.
lead_paragraph: The state is the first to change its laws, mostly for the better, since the Connecticut shooting.

headline.seo: New York Leads on Gun Control
headline.main: New York Leads on Gun Control
headline.print_headline: New York Leads on Gun Control
